title: 91/7/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 December 1990 approving the programme of measures submitted by the Irish Government for 1991 on special support for the development of agricultural statistics in Ireland (only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 7 December 1990  approving the programme of measures submitted by the Irish Government for 1991 on special support for the development of agricultural statistics in Ireland  (Only the English text is authentic)  (91/7/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
The programme of measures on special support for the development of agricultural statistics in Ireland submitted by the Irish Government for 1991 is approved.   Article 2
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 December 1990.
For the Commission
Henning CHRISTOPHERSEN
Vice-President   (1) OJ No L 186, 16. 7. 1988, p. 39. (2)
OJ No L 359, 8. 12. 1989, p. 5.
